doc.field: Series I. Women's Sports Foundation archives
Series I. Women's Sports Foundation archives

Subseries I.A includes files originally stored in the WSF office in vertical filing cabinets labeled "WSF Archives." This group of material was maintained by staff as the core historical documentation of the organization. Files provide insight into the programming, structure, and goals of the Foundation over time. The earliest material includes the Foundation's "Statement of Purpose," newsletters, and member and subscriber surveys. Additional document types include the Foundation's newsletters, annual reports, annual scholarship guides, coach and parent guides, reports and studies, and newspaper clippings. WSF programs and events, particularly the WSF Annual Summit, New York Awards Dinner (NYAD), National Girls and Women in Sports Day (NGWSD), and GoGirlGo! events, are documented over time in event programs and planning materials. Files date from 1974 to 2018.
